title: Mary Kochan, Surrogacy, Distributism Productive Catholic Masculine Energy
description:
Mary is back and as usual she's ready to get right down to business! 

Mary's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2leFZRD0ZlQDQxpR2Zd8oA

Mary's Story https://youtu.be/WdlMtQSKszc
Is Jehovah's Witness a Cult? https://youtu.be/mSiXzJkIj0c

David Rubin, talks to a lot of conservatives

Started announcing that he's starting a family
Adoptions, surrogacy? 

Depriving a baby of a mother

Warren Farrell

Commodifies human life, female bodies, preys upon poor women

David Rubin is really trying to be a good person

Things we knew until 10 minutes ago

Prioritizing the need of the child above the adult's preferences

Compensatory arrangements 

Distributism

Catholic social teaching as you have never heard it

What does the church say you (the man) is supposed to have

The head of a family is that the owner of your own private productive property that you use to supply the needs of the family. To be a free and independent person, not dependent on someone else. 

What would the church say to David (Dave Rubin's partner)? 

Your desire to be a father is wonderful. It noble, is good. It is the calling of a man. It comes out of a good place in  you. To imitate God. How ought you to go about that. 

A lot of it has to do with what we're worshiping

Roman Catholic church has a big appreciation for male sexual energy as a great potent thing. The basic thing that runs a civilization is male, sexual energy. 

You have this great energy and we want to give you mastery of that energy to channel that for the building of civilization. The church has all sorts of spiritual tools, psychological tools, etc. to channel that energy. 

Voth : the man is like the trolley car, the woman is the track that directs that energy. 

Sarah wants Abraham's sexual energy to be involved. 

Sexual energy sublimated to greater things. 

Pope John Paul: the Church does not have the authority to ordain women

If the Virgin Mary is not a priest then we don't have the authority

Sub-mission

Man needed the support of women that mankind may not fall

Not enough coming to grips with the pervasive injustices of the society

Can distributism answer game b questions

The Chester-Belloc

The Servile State

How did the church reformulate, an economy of wide ownership. How did that change? 

Productive property widely distributed

Bret Weinstein Subsidiarity

Own or be-owned

You can only give charity to the un-deserving. 

The beggar is the protagonist of history. 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A
